title: Study Of Craters Suggests Earth Once Had Saturn-Like Rings
content: The study said that the asteroid belt was formed due to the break-up of an asteroid passing within Earth's Roche limit.
summary: The study said that the asteroid belt was formed due to the break-up of an asteroid passing within Earth's Roche limit.

title: US Rappers' Trusted Aide Linked To Sex Trafficking In Ongoing Investigation
content: Hip-hop mogul Sean Diddy' Combs' chief of staff, Kristina Khorram, who was once described as his "right hand", is now considered a "manipulator in chief", sources close to the federal sex trafficking investigation have said.

title: The Long Road To White House: Joe Biden's Five-Decade Political Career

title: Sri Lanka Polls: Frontrunners, What's At Stake, Implications For India

title: Tupperware Files For Bankruptcy After Years-Long Sales Struggle

title: What Is A Pager And Why Hezbollah Still Relies On This Outdated Device
content: A pager or ‘beeper’ is a small, portable communication device that receives short messages, typically numeric or alphanumeric, over a radio frequency signal.
summary: A pager or ‘beeper’ is a small, portable communication device that receives short messages, typically numeric or alphanumeric, over a radio frequency signal.

title: Trump Shares What Kamala Harris Told Him On Call After Assassination Bid
content: Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump says that he got "a very nice call" from his Democratic adversary Kamala Harris on Tuesday following the second assassination attempt.

title: New Chinese Heliport Puts Pressure On Remote Frontier In Eastern Arunachal
content: A new Chinese heliport being constructed 20 km east of the Line of Actual Control may give Chinese armed forces the ability to speedily move in military resources into an under-developed, remote area along the Indo-Chinese frontier.
summary: A new Chinese heliport being constructed 20 km east of the Line of Actual Control may give Chinese armed forces the ability to speedily move in military resources into an under-developed, remote area along the Indo-Chinese frontier.

title: New XEC Covid Variant Spreads To 27 Countries, Here's What We Know So Far

title: "Only Consequential Presidents Get Shot At": Trump After Assassination Bid

title: "Israel Will Certainly Receive Its Punishment": Hezbollah After Pager Attacks
content: Iran-backed Hezbollah vowed to retaliate against Israel after accusing it of detonating pagers across Lebanon, that killed nine people and injured about 2,800 others on Tuesday.

title: 3 Grams Of Explosives Per Pager: Israel's Complex Op To Hurt Hezbollah
content: Israel's Mossad spy agency planted a small amount of explosives inside 5,000 Taiwan-made pagers ordered by Lebanese group Hezbollah months before Tuesday's detonations, a senior Lebanese security source and another source told Reuters.
summary: Israel's Mossad spy agency planted a small amount of explosives inside 5,000 Taiwan-made pagers ordered by Lebanese group Hezbollah months before Tuesday's detonations, a senior Lebanese security source and another source told Reuters.

title: Russian Group Behind Fake Kamala Harris Hit-And-Run Story: Microsoft
content: A false claim circulating on social media that Democratic presidential candidate Kamala Harris left a 13-year-old girl paralyzed after an alleged hit-and-run is the work of a Russian disinformation operation, according to research by Microsoft.
summary: A false claim circulating on social media that Democratic presidential candidate Kamala Harris left a 13-year-old girl paralyzed after an alleged hit-and-run is the work of a Russian disinformation operation, according to research by Microsoft.

title: China Delivery Agent, 55, Dies On Bike After Working 18-Hour Days

title: "Not Aware, Not Involved": US On Lebanon Pager Blasts
content: The United States said Tuesday it was not aware in advance and had no involvement in mass explosions of pagers used by Lebanon's Hezbollah, as it urged restraint by Iran in response.
summary: The United States said Tuesday it was not aware in advance and had no involvement in mass explosions of pagers used by Lebanon's Hezbollah, as it urged restraint by Iran in response.

title: New Security Arrangements Needed If...: Head Of Secret Service To Trump
content: The head of the Secret Service told Donald Trump in a private meeting that significant new security arrangements will be needed if he wants to keep playing golf, The New York Times reported on Tuesday.
